transcript.title: PMÂ No 93/1966 - Prime Minister's Health
transcript.content:
PMÂ No. 93/1966

The Prime Minister is continuing to makeÂ satisfactory progress.

Hoowever, as viral pleurisy normally takesÂ five to seven days to run its course, Mr. Holt will haveÂ to remain in bed for a day or two yet. He is hopefulÂ that he will be back in Parliament during the week outÂ this will depend on his further progress.Â 

His doctor gave him a thorough check-up todayÂ and confirmed that there were no complications.

The Leader of the Opposition, Mr. CalwellÂ rang the Lodge today to enquire about Mr. Holt's health andÂ to wish him well.

25th Septebmer, 1966.Â
